answerText: supercells[10] Beneath the anvil of supercells are these pouch-like clouds that form when the cold air of the anvil sinks into warmer air.

subject: Science
question: Question: They can be classified as classic, low precipitation and high precipitation. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of thunderstorm that forms a certain phenomenon within its mesocyclone.
